Select Another Image Reference Number: Email Address: Logo Start Over Picture to upload Hint 1 Hint 2 Hint 3 Hint 4 Picture 1 Picture 2 Picture 3 Picture 4 Picture 5 Picture 6 Picture 7 Picture 8 Picture 9 Picture 10 Before After A Walk in the Park Beach Day Sassy! A Sea of Dew A Big Haul No edited photos
 No stretched images
 Not too bright, not too dark
 Each photo will be professionally edited for $5
 
 For more information before submitting your first photo - look at examples, read the helpful hints, and watch our YouTube channel Here at Pocket Tog, we are dedicated to giving you the best possible products money can get you. Here are some hints at how to achieve a great looking photo! Do not enlarge your picture before sending. Stretched images distort pixels and make editing very difficult. Lighting is essential to every photographers tool suite. If your image is too bright or too dark, then the photo will not be changed much. Modern day cell phones have editing tools that allow users to edit their own photos. While this is a good alternative to Pocket Tog, the tools do not come with the expertise that Pocket Tog does. With that said, please make sure that photos submitted are unedited. Let the professionals do the editing.We promise to edit every photo you send us, but sometimes the before and after are not as different as expected. Obscene or crude materials are not accepted at Pocket Tog. Any photo that is submitted, reviewed, and deemed pornographic or offensive will not be edited and discarded. Continued misuse of the app will block transactions from the offending users email.
